participant_1.background:
My hair is brown.
I am not thin.
I like to sew.
I am short.
I have one cat.

participant_2.background:
I plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats.
I go to a catholic high school in new england.
I have lived a very sheltered life.
I am 17.
I am about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.

content.text: I'm curious about your plans to raise hell and sew your wild oats.
I'm not really sure yet, but I'm excited to find out. I've lived a very sheltered life, so I'm looking forward to experiencing new things and meeting new people.
I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun. What do you think you'll do first?
I'm not sure yet. I've been thinking about going to a few music festivals, and I'm also looking forward to visiting some new cities.
Those sound like great plans. I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks. I'm excited to get started.
So, what do you think of the catholic high school you go to?
I'm not really a fan of it. It's very strict and conservative, and I feel like I'm not able to be myself there.
I can understand that. I'm glad you're going to a more liberal school in college.
Me too. I think it will be a lot more fun and I'll be able to meet more people with similar interests.
That's great. I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks. I'm excited to start my new life.
So, what do you want to do with your life after college?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going into law or business.
Those are both great options. I'm sure you'll be successful at whatever you do.
